```{r}
library(Rcpp)
cppFunction('CharacterVector generateNgramHexSequence (CharacterVector hexvector, int ngram) {
    int len = hexvector.size() - (ngram - 1);
    CharacterVector out(len);
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        out(i) = hexvector[i];
        for (int j = 1; j < ngram; j++) {
            out(i) += hexvector[i+j];
        }
    }
    return out;
}')
```
